characterDescription: Four Arms is a Tetramand with super strength and enhanced agility. He has four muscular arms and is one of Ben's favorite transformations for powerful combat.
Heatblast is a Pyronite with the ability to generate and manipulate intense flames. He is made of magma and can release fire blasts and fiery attacks.
XLR8 is a Kineceleran with superspeed abilities. With his wheel-like feet and retractable claws, he can reach extreme speeds, making him useful for quick escapes and high-speed chases.
